name: spotify-player
title: Spotify Player
description: Search and Play Spotify music from Raycast, and control your library with convenient commands.
author: mattisssa

commands.name: justPlay
commands.title: Just Play
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Starts the song by query straightway in Spotify

commands.name: nowPlayingMenuBar
commands.title: Menu Bar Player
commands.description: Shows currently playing song in the Subtitle and in the Menu Bar. It also automatically refreshes in the background once per minute.
commands.subtitle: Spotify

preferences.name: maxtitlelength
preferences.description: Max Menubar title length. Leave empty for no limitation.
preferences.title: Max. Menubar Title length

preferences.name: showEllipsis
preferences.description: Check to show ellipsis if title is longer than the max length.
preferences.title: Show Ellipsis
preferences.label: Show ellipsis (...) if title is truncated.

preferences.name: closeWindowOnAction
preferences.label: Yes/No
preferences.title: Close Window On Action
preferences.description: If checked then the Raycast window will be closed on action (Play/Pause)
